utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! You guys! You’re not gonna believe this! I just got off the phone with my agent…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! I’m sorry, too soon. You go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. I got nominated for my part on Days of Our Lives!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good for you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Congratulations! Wow! I can’t believe you’re nominated for an Emmy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh Soap Opera Digest award!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! I’m up for a Soapie!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey? Is that something you’re making up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, no! It’s real! And it has been since 1998. Hey Rach! Rach! I’m up for a Soapie!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God!! That is like the third most prestigious soap opera award there is!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you! Well, I guess now I know who I’m taking to the awards.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, stop that! Don’t kid about that! Will all the stars be there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Many are scheduled to appear.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God! I can’t go! I’m gonna be too nervous!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I’ll go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No!! You are getting married! This is all I have.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: …and it was Ernst Muhlbrat who first hypothesized that the Velociraptor would expand it’s collar and emit a high pitched noise to frighten it’s predator. Yes Mr. Lewis?

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: What kinda noise?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just a high pitched intimidating noise.

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: But like how?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well we-we don’t know for sure. But in my head it-it sounded something like this. Of course, this is just conjecture. Okay, that’s uh, that’s all for today. Uh Mr. Morse, can I see you for a moment?

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: Yes sir.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mr. Morse I need to talk to you about your mid-term exam, I’m afraid I-I had to fail you.

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well you need 60% to pass…

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: What’d I get?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Seven.

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: That’s not so good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no it’s not. What-what happened there Ned?

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: Well maybe you can cut me some slack. I’m sort of in love.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I’m sorry but, that-that’s really not my problem.

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: I’m in love with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well that brings me in the loop a little.

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: You see, that’s why I did so bad on this test. I’m having a hard time concentrating. When you’re up there and you’re teaching and your face gets all serious…you look so good. You wear that tight little turtleneck sweater…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Umm, I uh, I’m your teacher. I’m sorry, you’re-you’re a student and I-and I like women. In spite of what may be written on the backs of some of these chairs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! That guy at the counter is totally checking you out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? My God, he’s really cute.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Go for it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, I’m engaged!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m just saying, get his number just in case. But no Chandler is in an accident and can’t perform sexually and he would want you to take a lover to satisfy the needs that he can no longer fulfill.

utterance.speaker: The Cute Guy
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Op, can I just tell you something? Very flattered but umm, I’m engaged.

utterance.speaker: The Cute Guy
utterance.content: Wow! Uh, this is kind of embarrassing. I was actually coming over to talk to your friend.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well you should be embarrassed.

utterance.speaker: The Cute Guy
utterance.content: I thought you knew I was looking at you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I did, but that was really fun.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And the winner is…Joey Tribbiani! Oh… Wow! I honestly never expected this. I uh, I didn’t prepare a speech. But umm, I’d like to thank my parents, who’ve always been there for me. I’d also like to thank my friends, Chandler, Monica, Phoebe, Rachel…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m fourth! Look at you with your little maple syrup award!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah may-maybe you don’t tell anyone about this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? No! It’s not a big deal! I do that too, with my shampoo bottle.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What award are you practicing for?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Grammy, Best New Artist.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey listen! The Soapie’s called today and I also get to present an award.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh that’s great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So you’ll definitely get onstage, even if you don’t win.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What you-you don’t think I’m gonna win?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well of course I do! But y’know, favorite returning character is a tough category Joey. I mean you’re up against the guy who survived his own cremation.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. No-no I-I know I might not win, but it’s just…I’ve never even been nominated before! I want it so much.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well Joey, you’ll probably get it. But you should probably your-your gracious loser face. Y’know when like the cameras are on you and you wanna look disappointed but also that your colleague deserved to win. Y’know? So it’s sorta like…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You practice losing the Grammies too?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, at the Grammies I always win.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! How’d your date go with Jake?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, great! We couldn’t keep our eyes off each other all night and then every once and a while y’know, he’d kinda lean over and stroke my hair and touch my neck.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, stop it Phoebe, you’re getting me all tingly.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All I could think of was y’know, "Is he gonna kiss me? Is he gonna kiss me?"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And did he?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m a lady Monica, I don’t kiss and tell. But this hickey speaks for itself.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay-okay, I got it. I got it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just like him so much that I just feel like I’ve had 10 drinks today and I’ve only had six.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I haven’t had that feeling since I first started going out with Chandler. Wow, I’m never gonna have that feeling again am I?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You sound like a guy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, a guy would be saying, "I’m never gonna get to sleep with anyone else." Oh my God! I’m never gonna get to sleep with anyone else! I’ve been so busy planning the wedding that I forgot about all the things that I’d be giving up! I mean, I…I’m never gonna have a first kiss again.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’ll have a last kiss.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can I ask you something? Have you ever had a guy have a crush on you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is that why you wanted to tie my tie?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There’s this kid in my class who said he’s in love with me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross has a boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I do-I do not have a boyfriend. There’s a guy in one of my classes who-who has a crush on me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! I don’t know. I mean, last year Elizabeth now-now this kid. What-what-what-what is it?! Am I giving out some kind of…sexy professor vibe?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Not right now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It-it—The point is my natural charisma has made him fail his midterm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, see now I feel bad for the kid! I had a crush on a teacher once and it was so hard! Y’know you—I couldn’t concentrate and I blushed every time he looked at me. I mean come on, you remember what’s it’s like to be 19 and in love.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. I guess I can cut him some slack.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How’d you get over that teacher?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I didn’t. I got under him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Problem solved.

utterance.speaker: Jake
utterance.content: Bye Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay bye.

utterance.speaker: Jake
utterance.content: All right. Bye.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye! We said good-bye at the door so as not to flaunt our new love.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, it’s okay. You don’t have to tip toe around me. I-I’ve been thinking about it and umm, y’know what? I’m okay about not having that new relationship feeling…

utterance.speaker: Jake
utterance.content: I miss you already!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I miss you too!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See? That’s what I mean. I mean that, that’s great! But I wouldn’t trade in what I have for that. I mean I’m gonna be with Chandler for the rest of my life, and that’s what makes me happy. Hey sweetie, come here! Come sit down. Hey Phoebe and I were just talking about how our relationship is deep and meaningful. It really is don’t you think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh totally! Pull my finger.

utterance.speaker: Announcer
utterance.content: Presenting the award for Favorite Returning Male Character is McKensize…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is it! This is my category.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know! My God! Do you have your speech?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I got my speech!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you got your gracious loser face?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now Joey remember, if you win you have to hug me! You hug me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Can I squeeze your ass?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: On TV?! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ‘Kay!

utterance.speaker: The Presenter
utterance.content: …in the category of Favorite Returning Male Character the nominees are: John Wheeler from General Hospital , Gavin Grant from The Young and the Restless , Dunkin Harrington from Passions , and Joey Tribbiani from Days of Our Lives . And the Soapie goes to……Gavin Grant from The Young and the Restless!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What the?!

utterance.speaker: Announcer
utterance.content: Presenting the award for Favorite Supporting Actress is Joey Tribbiani from Days of Our Lives.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Any one of the brilliant actresses nominated for this award tonight deserves to take it home. Unfortunately only one can. The nominees for Best Supporting Actress are from Passions Erin Goff. From One Life to Live Mary Loren Bishop , from All My Children Sarah Mchann, and from Days of Our Lives Jessica Ashley. And the winner is……Jessica Ashley from Days of Our Lives. Uh, unfortunately Jessica couldn’t be with us tonight so I’ll be accepting this award on her behalf. And I’m sure that Jessica would like to thank my parents who always believed in me. She’d also like to thank my friends, Chandler, Monica, Ross, Phoebe, and Rachel who’s sittin’ right there!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey! Why did we have to rush out of there so fast?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach we had to get out of there because, look what I won!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God you stole her award!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no! No, I’m accepting it on her behalf.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey I don’t think you know what behalf means.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure I do! It’s a verb! As in, "I behalfin’ it!"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, you have got to take this back!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But why?! I should’ve won one and I really want it and she didn’t even care enough to come to the thing! It could also be a Grammy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on Rach! No one saw me take it! There was a whole table full of ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you really want an award you didn’t win?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! I want an award I did win! But nobody’s giving me any of those! Plus—Hey Rach, if-if I put it up there right? When people come over they’ll see it and they’ll think I won it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey is says Best Supporting Actress!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can scratch that right off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey no, this is wrong! You have to take it back, okay? You don’t want to win an award this way. You’re very talented. And someday you’re gonna win one of these for real and that one is gonna mean something.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right? Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’ll take it back tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If I can’t have it you can’t have it!

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: Professor Geller?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes Mr. Lewis, how can I help you?

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: I know I didn’t do well on my midterms and stuff but, I was kinda hoping you could change my grade.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And why exactly would I do that?

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: Because I’m in love with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m all…in love with you and stuff. So could you change my grade?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: Well why not you changed Ned’s grade!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well that’s different! Okay? Because he, he was actually in love with me!

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: No he’s not! He’s totally yanking your chain! He’s done this with three other teachers!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: He’s got a girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can’t believe someone would do that for a grade.

utterance.speaker: Lewis
utterance.content: I know! It’s awful. I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you seen Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ‘Cause I just keeping thinking about all these things that I’m not gonna have and it’s freaking me out. I don’t know what to do about it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, don’t sweat it. Chandler is nowhere around so go ahead get it out of your system. That guy’s cute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! Come on I’m serious! I just got to talk to him about all this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No that is the last thing you want to do!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because you’re marrying him!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You gotta help me out here Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I’ve never been engaged and I’ve never really been married, but I can only tell you what my mother told me. Whenever you have doubts or fears or anxieties about a relationship, do not communicate them to your husband.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So I’m not supposed to share my doubts and fears with the guy I’m gonna spend the rest of my life with?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That is correct! Yes, you’re supposed to take all of that stuff and put it in a little box in your mind and then lock it up tight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Your mother told you this?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The woman that got married a bunch of times and killed herself when you were 13?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! You’re right! Go! Go tell Chandler! Hurry before it’s too late! Wait no! Does this also mean putting out doesn’t get you love?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot believe I’m gonna meet Jessica Ashley!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay wait-wait p-please be cool! Okay? I work with this woman.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I’m totally cool!

utterance.speaker: Jessica Ashley
utterance.content: Come in.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Jessica.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Jess.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, this is my friend Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Jessica Ashley
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ‘Sup?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh listen, here’s your Soapie. I accepted it for ya.

utterance.speaker: Jessica Ashley
utterance.content: Oh my God! I won! Do you have any idea what this means?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, that-that-that’s it? You’re gonna, you’re gonna put it on your self or anything?

utterance.speaker: Jessica Ashley
utterance.content: No, I try to save that for real awards. Now, if you’ll excuse me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Take it back?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y-y-yeah! Yeah you do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, as we get closer to the wedding, is there anything that you would like to talk about or share?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. Well, I think the centerpieces are too big

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re wrong! The centerpieces are fine! Do you ever get scared at all?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kinda. They’re really big.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Doesn’t it ever just freak you out that-that you’re never gonna be with anybody new again?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Just, I love you so much. Just…It’s just sometimes it bothers me that I’m never gonna have that feeling. Y’know when you meet someone for the first time and it’s new and exciting? Y’know that rush?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No, see when I first meet somebody it’s uh it’s mostly panic, anxiety, and a great deal of sweating.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, but all right you’re a guy, does it not freak you that you’re never gonna sleep with anybody else?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sleeping with somebody new, anxiety, panic, and I’m afraid even more sweating.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Even with me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was dangerously dehydrated during the first six months of our relationship. Look, for me the rush is knowing that we are gonna be together for the rest of our lives.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well yeah! But now that I know that you’re having these thoughts, I’m back to panic, anxiety, and uh I’m definitely gonna need some kind of sports drink.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come here! Come here! Sweetie you don’t have to worry. No, besides y’know what? I’m gonna have a lot of new things with you. The first time we buy a house. Our first kid. Our first grandkid…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Water! Water! Water!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh Mr. Morse, can I speak to you for a moment?

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: That was a great lecture today. Did you get a little hair cut?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-hmm, yeah-yeah do you like it? Do-do you looove it? I just want you to know that I’m changing your grade back.

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: What?! Why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ‘Cause I know what you’re trying to pull here. Okay? It’s not gonna work.

utterance.speaker: Morse
utterance.content: I’m not trying to pull anything. Look I love you dude.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? I-I’m not even gonna talk about this. Okay? This little thing is over. I know you have a girlfriend! Okay——Yeah! And I know about the other professors! How do you think that makes me feel Ned?! You used me! You don’t love me and you never did! Ah Professor Winston, Professor Fredrickson, I’ll be right with you. Don’t make this worse and I’ll give you a C. Shall we?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll be out in a second.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. It’s just so unexpected! I…I uh…Boy I’ll tell you it’s just such an honor to be nominated for a Nobel Prize and y’know to win one for a massage. Especially after having just won a Tony award for best actress in…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, we have to go. Our reservations are at 8:00.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: …in Reservations at 8:00 by Neil Simon. Thank-thank you Neil. Thank you for the words.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay honey, you can finish this later we’re gonna be late. We gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please, don’t play the music. Just uh one more. LIVE FROM NEW YORK! IT’S SATURDAY NIGHT!!
